top.title: Hong Kong court jails media tycoon and British citizen Jimmy Lai for 20 years
top.summary: Lai's supporters say this amounts to a death sentence, but authorities say it demonstrates the rule of law.

top.title: Japanese stocks surge as Takaichi secures historic election victory
top.summary: Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's Liberal Democratic Party  secured 316 out of 465 seats in Sunday's election.

top.title: Maxwell won't answer questions from Congress, lawyer says
top.summary: Ghislaine Maxwell,  the jailed associate of sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, will invoke her Fifth Amendment right to avoid self-incrimination.

top.title: EU tells Meta to let rivals run AI chatbots on WhatsApp
top.summary: A Meta spokesperson said the EU had "no reason" to intervene over it changing the app in January.

top.title: Baldur's Gate to be turned into TV series - without the game's developers
top.summary: The show will be made by Craig Mazin, who co-created the acclaimed game adaptation The Last Of Us.

top.title: Uber ordered to pay $8.5m over claim driver raped passenger
top.summary: The verdict is expected to influence the outcome of thousands of other cases against the ride hailing firm.

title.#text: Animal Crossing started life as a dungeon crawler
HBO Max is finally launching in the UK next month
Live Nation’s monopoly trial is reportedly fracturing Trump’s Justice Department
